documentation.text: @dev Sets the batch status to ConsumedOrSold (final state).
@dev Sets the batch status to Destroyed (final state).
@dev Returns the current state details of the batch.

devdoc.details: Data container for medicine batches. State managed strictly by SupplyChainLogic.      Uses standard naming conventions internally; public interface preserved.

getDetails().details: Returns the current state details of the batch.

setConsumedOrSold().details: Sets the batch status to ConsumedOrSold (final state).

setDestroyed(bytes32).details: Sets the batch status to Destroyed (final state).

setInTransit(uint8,address,address).details: Sets the batch status to an "InTransit" state and assigns transporter/destination.

params._destination: The address of the intended receiver.
params._nextTransitStatus: The target transit status (InTransitToW, InTransitToD, InTransitToC).

setReceived(uint8,address).details: Sets the batch status to an "At" state upon receipt and updates the owner.

params._nextAtStatus: The target received status (AtWholesaler, AtDistributor, AtCustomer).
params._receiver: The address of the receiver (becomes the new owner).

devdoc.title: Medicine (Batch Contract)
